show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: Life Rules!
content: A talk with Ellen LaConte about her book Life Rules: Nature’s Blueprint for Surviving Economic and Environmental... <!--more--> Collapse about the planetary Critical Mass of interrelated crises, Earth’s “steep economic learning curve,” creating lifeways that mimic Life’s ways, and transitioning to “Earthonomical communities and regions”; poem by Mary Oliver
